Actions.Name: Thumper Gun
Actions.Effects: Ignores ranged attack penalties. A different foe in range 3 is shoved 1.

Actions.Name: Flame Bomb
Actions.Effects: Burning foes must save or become winded.

Actions.Name: Self Destruct
Actions.Description: The Clank begins shuddering. At the start of its next turn, it explodes, instantly defeating it and creating a blast 1 area effect on its location. Characters inside must save or take 2[D]+[fray] damage, or [D]+[fray] on a successful save.
